name: Svelte Task Manager
description: Build a task manager with SvelteKit
prompt:
Create a SvelteKit task manager with:
- Task CRUD operations
- Drag-and-drop functionality
- Progress tracking
- Category and tag system
- Search and filter
- Dark/light theme
- Real-time updates
- Export functionality
- Mobile PWA

Requirements:
- Use SvelteKit with TypeScript
- Implement Svelte stores for state
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include progressive web app features
- Ensure accessibility
- Add animations and transitions
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Svelte E-commerce Site
description: Build an e-commerce site with SvelteKit
prompt:
Create a SvelteKit e-commerce site with:
- Product catalog
- Shopping cart
- Checkout process
- Admin panel
- Search functionality
- User accounts
- Payment integration
- Order tracking
- Responsive design

Requirements:
- Use SvelteKit with TypeScript
- Implement database integration
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include admin features
- Ensure security
- Add analytics
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
